Accordions

Standard Accordion 
<div class="accordion" role="tablist" multiselectable="true">
	<div class="accordion__title" role="tablist">
		<button aria-selected="true" aria-expanded="false"><span class="more"></span> Accordion Title #1</button>
	</div>
	<div class="accordion__content" role="tabpanel" aria-hidden="true">
		Accordion Content
	</div>
	<div class="accordion__title" role="tablist">
		<button aria-selected="true" aria-expanded="false"><span class="more"></span> Accordion Title #2</button>
	</div>
	<div class="accordion__content" role="tabpanel" aria-hidden="true">
		Accordion Content
	</div>
	<div class="accordion__title" role="tablist">
		<button aria-selected="true" aria-expanded="false"><span class="more"></span> Accordion Title #3</button>
	</div>
	<div class="accordion__content" role="tabpanel" aria-hidden="true">
		Accordion Content
	</div>
</div>
Accordion Content
Accordion Content
Accordion Content

Tabs

Natural Tabs 
<div class="tabs">
	<ul class="tabs__nav" role="tablist">
		<li role="presentation">
			<button data-tab-target="tab_id_1" role="tab" aria-controls="tab_id_1" aria-selected="false">Tab #1</button>
		</li>
		<li role="presentation">
			<button data-tab-target="tab_id_2" role="tab" aria-controls="tab_id_2" aria-selected="false">Tab #2</button>
		</li>
		<li role="presentation">
			<button data-tab-target="tab_id_3" role="tab" aria-controls="tab_id_3" aria-selected="false">Tab #3</button>
		</li>
	</ul>
	<div class="tabs__system">
		<div id="tab_id_1" class="tabs__tab" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="tab_id_1" aria-hidden="true">
			<p>Tab 1 content goes here.</p>
		</div>
		<div id="tab_id_2" class="tabs__tab" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="tab_id_2" aria-hidden="true">
			<p>Tab 2 content goes here.</p>
		</div>
		<div id="tab_id_3" class="tabs__tab" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="tab_id_3" aria-hidden="true">
			<p>Tab 3 content goes here.</p>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

Tab 1 content goes here.

Tab 2 content goes here.

Tab 3 content goes here.

Full Width Tabs 
<div class="tabs tabs-full-width">
	<ul class="tabs__nav" role="tablist">
		<li role="presentation">
			<button data-tab-target="tab_id_1" role="tab" aria-controls="tab_id_1" aria-selected="false">Tab #1</button>
		</li>
		<li role="presentation">
			<button data-tab-target="tab_id_2" role="tab" aria-controls="tab_id_2" aria-selected="false">Tab #2</button>
		</li>
		<li role="presentation">
			<button data-tab-target="tab_id_3" role="tab" aria-controls="tab_id_3" aria-selected="false">Tab #3</button>
		</li>
	</ul>
	<div class="tabs__system">
		<div id="tab_id_1" class="tabs__tab" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="tab_id_1" aria-hidden="true">
			<p>Tab 1 content goes here.</p>
		</div>
		<div id="tab_id_2" class="tabs__tab" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="tab_id_2" aria-hidden="true">
			<p>Tab 2 content goes here.</p>
		</div>
		<div id="tab_id_3" class="tabs__tab" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="tab_id_3" aria-hidden="true">
			<p>Tab 3 content goes here.</p>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

Tab 1 content goes here.

Tab 2 content goes here.

Tab 3 content goes here.

Tables

Normal Table 
<table class="table">
	<thead>
		<tr>
			<th>Title</th>
			<th>Title</th>
			<th>Title</th>
			<th>Title</th>
		</tr>
	</thead>
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>Content</td>
			<td>Content</td>
			<td>Content</td>
			<td>Content</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td>Content</td>
			<td>Content</td>
			<td>Content</td>
			<td>Content</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td>Content</td>
			<td>Content</td>
			<td>Content</td>
			<td>Content</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

	<thead>
		<tr>
			<th>Title</th>
			<th>Title</th>
			<th>Title</th>
			<th>Title</th>
		</tr>
	</thead>
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>Content</td>
			<td>Content</td>
			<td>Content</td>
			<td>Content</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td>Content</td>
			<td>Content</td>
			<td>Content</td>
			<td>Content</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td>Content</td>
			<td>Content</td>
			<td>Content</td>
			<td>Content</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>

		</tr>

Sliders / Carousels

Sliders are provided by the excellent BX Slider. These are basic examples and not predefined in the Framework. View the BX Slider Options to learn more about the extensive API.

Full Width Slider 
<div class="slider-container">
	<div class="slider">
		<div class="slider__slide">
			<img src="http://fillmurray.com/400/150" alt="Placeholder">
		</div>
		<div class="slider__slide">
			<img src="http://fillmurray.com/400/150" alt="Placeholder">
		</div>
		<div class="slider__slide">
